cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to -1 provides an invalid negative value for thread count, causing configuration validation failure and gNB startup error.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 15 exceeds the maximum allowed downlink slots in a TDD frame (typically 0-14), causing invalid TDD configuration and cell setup failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將下行時隙數設定為 15 超過 TDD 幀中允許的最大下行時隙數（通常為 0-14），會導致無效的 TDD 配置和細胞設定失敗。
